itemDescription: English member of parliament and recipient of the Victoria Cross (1893-1983)

wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier Sir John George Smyth, 1st Baronet,  (24 October 1893 – 26 April 1983), often known as Jackie Smyth, was a British Indian Army officer and a Conservative Member of Parliament. Although a recipient of the Victoria Cross, his military career ended in controversy.

response: *Sir John Smyth, 1st Baronet (1893–1983), British MP, Privy Counsellor in 1962, recipient of the Victoria Cross during the First World War
